statements: SELECT * FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT ticket_id, visitor_id, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type FROM ticket_sales WHERE visitor_id = 100;
SELECT visitor_id, ticket_type FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_date = '2022-02-28' ORDER BY purchase_time;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_time DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets_sold FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY visitor_id HAVING total_tickets_sold > 1;
SELECT visitor_id, ticket_type, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, visitor_id, ticket_type, purchase_date, purchase_time FROM ticket_sales WHERE visitor_id IN (1001, 1003, 1005) AND purchase_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '17:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT ticket_type, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY ticket_type ORDER BY total_tickets DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT visitor_id, age, location FROM visitor_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tickets, AVG(ticket_price) AS avg_price FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT MAX(ticket_price) AS max_price, MIN(ticket_price) AS min_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ticket_id, visitor_id, ticket_price, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, age, gender, location FROM visitor_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age;
SELECT ticket_id, visitor_id, ticket_price, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, age, gender, location FROM visitor_demographics WHERE location LIKE 'New York%' ORDER BY visitor_id;
SELECT ticket_id, visitor_id, ticket_price, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price < 100 OR purchase_date = '2021-11-25' ORDER BY ticket_price ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, age, location FROM visitor_demographics WHERE age < 30;
SELECT ride_name, wait_time_minutes FROM ride_wait_times WHERE park_area = 'Adventure Land' ORDER BY wait_time_minutes ASC;
SELECT visitor_name, gender FROM visitor_demographics WHERE location IS NULL;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT visitor_name, age, location FROM visitor_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT ride_name, wait_time_minutes, park_area FROM ride_wait_times WHERE wait_time_minutes > 30 AND park_area = 'Adventure Land';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price >= 50 ORDER BY ticket_id;
SELECT visitor_name, location FROM visitor_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_id = 1001;
SELECT ticket_price, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50.00;
SELECT visitor_id, ride_id FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT visitor_name, age, gender FROM visitor_demographics WHERE age >= 18 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT ride_id, ride_name, wait_time_minutes FROM ride_wait_times ORDER BY wait_time_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales JOIN visitor_demographics ON ticket_sales.visitor_id = visitor_demographics.visitor_id WHERE visitor_demographics.age >= 18 AND visitor_demographics.gender = 'Female';
SELECT park_name, location, establishment_date FROM park_information WHERE location = 'Orlando' ORDER BY establishment_date;
SELECT visitor_name, age, location FROM visitor_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT ride_name, wait_time_minutes, last_updated FROM ride_wait_times WHERE wait_time_minutes > 30 ORDER BY wait_time_minutes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, name, age FROM visitor_demographics WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT ride_name, wait_time FROM ride_wait_times WHERE wait_time > 30 ORDER BY wait_time ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, purchase_date FROM visitor_tickets WHERE visitor_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT ride_name, description FROM ride_details WHERE capacity >= 100;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM visitor_demographics WHERE age > 25 AND nationality = 'USA';
SELECT ride_name, wait_time FROM ride_wait_times WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT visitor_id FROM visitor_tickets WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT ride_name, description, capacity FROM ride_details WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY ride_name ASC;
